reviewText: It was a well made story of WW11 and the true stories of what really took place - I was there immediately following the end as a young occupation soldier.
DVD in excellent condition.  Comes in European format, in French and English. Very good buy.

You saw him star in FANNY with Leslie Caron. And TIGER BAY when Hayley Mills was a teenager. He died a few years ago and his films, mostly filmed in Germany, are true collector's items. Available through Amazon, although a few are in PAL, the European version.

One could write an intellectual review of this lovely film-but forgive me for saying that seeing Horst Buchholz-once voted  the most handsome man on earth-nude in a lovely pastoral setting- is worth 5 stars alone
